A

ActionBarAnnotationHandlers - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler
An AnnotationHandlers implementation providing AnnotationHandler instances for ActionBar associated fragments and classes.
ActionBarDelegate - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment
ActionBarDelegate is used to wrap an instance of ActionBar or ActionBar in order to hide some implementation details when using ActionBar within fragments.
ActionBarDelegate(Context) - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.ActionBarDelegate
Creates a new instance of ActionBarDelegate with the given context.
ActionBarFragment - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment
A BaseFragment implementation that provides API allowing to access an instance of ActionBar directly from an implementation of this class.
ActionBarFragment() - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.ActionBarFragment
 
ActionBarFragment.ActionModeCallback - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment
A ActionMode.Callback basic implementation for ActionBarFragment that may be used to simplify action mode management within an implementation of such a fragment.
ActionBarFragmentAnnotationHandler - Interface in universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler
A FragmentAnnotationHandler extended interface for annotation handlers from the Fragments library that are used to handle processing of annotations attached to classes derived from the ActionBar Fragment classes provided by this library.
ActionBarOptions - Annotation Type in universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation
Defines an annotation for determining how an ActionBar should be set.
ActionBarOptions.HomeAsUp - Annotation Type in universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation
Defines an annotation for determining set of allowed flags for ActionBarOptions.homeAsUp() attribute.
ActionModeCallback() - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.ActionBarFragment.ActionModeCallback
Creates a new instance of ActionModeCallback without fragment.
ActionModeCallback(ActionBarFragment) - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.ActionBarFragment.ActionModeCallback
Creates a new instance of ActionModeCallback for the context of the given fragment.
ActionModeOptions - Annotation Type in universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation
Defines an annotation for determining how an ActionMode should be set.
ActivityDelegate - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment
ActivityDelegate is used to wrap an instance of Activity in order to hide some implementation details when using Activity context within fragments.
ActivityDelegate(Activity) - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.ActivityDelegate
Creates a new instance of ActivityDelegate for the given activity.
ADD - Static variable in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Fragment transaction type used to indicate that the associated fragment transaction should be committed using add operation.
addToBackStack(boolean) - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Sets a boolean flag indicating whether the associated fragment should be added into fragments back stack under its tag or not.
addToBackStack() - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Returns boolean indicating whether to add fragment into back stack.
allowEnterTransitionOverlap(boolean) - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Sets a boolean flag indicating whether enter transition for the associated fragment may overlap or not.
allowEnterTransitionOverlap() - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Returns boolean flag indicating whether overlapping for enter transition is allowed.
allowReturnTransitionOverlap(boolean) - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Sets a boolean flag indicating whether return transition for the associated fragment may overlap or not.
allowReturnTransitionOverlap() - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Returns boolean flag indicating whether overlapping for return transition is allowed.
allowStateLoss(boolean) - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Sets a boolean flag indicating whether FragmentTransaction for the associated fragment may be committed allowing state loss or not.
allowStateLoss() - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Returns boolean flag indicating whether to commit fragment transaction allowing state loss.
AnnotationHandler - Interface in universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler
Base interface for annotation handlers from the Fragments library that are used to handle processing of annotations attached to classes derived from base classes provided by this library or to theirs fields.
AnnotationHandlers - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler
Base factory and cache for AnnotationHandler instances for a specific classes from the Fragments library.
ANNOTATIONS_PROCESSING_ENABLED - Static variable in class universum.studios.android.fragment.FragmentsConfig
Flag indicating whether the processing of annotations for the Fragments library is enabled or not.
arguments(Bundle) - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Sets an arguments for the associated fragment.
arguments() - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Returns the arguments that should be attached to the associated fragment.
ATTACH - Static variable in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentRequest
Fragment transaction type used to indicate that the associated fragment transaction should be committed using attach operation.

B

BackPressWatcher - Interface in universum.studios.android.fragment
The BackPressWatcher interface specifies one callback that may be used to dispatch a back button press event to a watcher that implements this interface.
BaseAnnotationHandlers - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler
An AnnotationHandlers implementation providing AnnotationHandler instances for classes from the fragments base package.
BaseFragment - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment
A Fragment implementation designed to provide extended API and logic that is useful almost every time you need to implement your desired fragment.
BaseFragment() - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.BaseFragment
Creates a new instance of BaseFragment.
BaseFragmentFactory - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment.manage
A FragmentFactory base implementation that may be used for fragment factories used across Android application project.

Creates a new instance of BaseFragmentFactory.
BaseManagementAnnotationHandlers - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler
An AnnotationHandlers implementation providing AnnotationHandler instances for base management associated fragments and classes.
BasicFragmentTransition - Class in universum.studios.android.fragment.transition
Basic implementation of FragmentTransition that may be used to create instances of fragment transactions with desired fragment animations.
BasicFragmentTransition(int, int) - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.transition.BasicFragmentTransition
Same as BasicFragmentTransition.BasicFragmentTransition(int, int, int, int) with back-stack animations set to FragmentTransition.NO_ANIMATION.
BasicFragmentTransition(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.transition.BasicFragmentTransition
Same as BasicFragmentTransition.BasicFragmentTransition(int, int, int, int, String) with name specified as "UNKNOWN".
BasicFragmentTransition(int, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.transition.BasicFragmentTransition
Creates a new instance of BasicFragmentTransition with the specified animations and name.
BasicFragmentTransition(Parcel) - Constructor for class universum.studios.android.fragment.transition.BasicFragmentTransition
Called form BasicFragmentTransition.CREATOR to create an instance of FragmentTransition form the given parcel source.
BEFORE_SUPER - Static variable in annotation type universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.MenuOptions
Flag indicating that a menu should be created before a super's one.

C

checkIfEnabledOrThrow() - Static method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.FragmentAnnotations
Performs check for enabled state of the annotations processing for the Fragments library.
clearBackStack() - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentController
Clears fragments back stack by calling FragmentManager.popBackStack() in loop for current back stack size obtained via FragmentManager.getBackStackEntryCount().
clearBackStackImmediate() - Method in class universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentController
Like FragmentController.clearBackStack() but this will call FragmentManager.popBackStackImmediate() instead of FragmentManager.popBackStack().

CREATOR - Static variable in class universum.studios.android.fragment.transition.BasicFragmentTransition
Creator used to create an instance or array of instances of BasicFragmentTransition from Parcel.
CROSS_FADE - Static variable in class universum.studios.android.fragment.transition.FragmentTransitions
Transition that may be used to fade a new incoming fragment into the screen and an outgoing (the current one) will be faded out of the screen.
CROSS_FADE_AND_HOLD - Static variable in class universum.studios.android.fragment.transition.FragmentTransitions
Like FragmentTransitions.CROSS_FADE but this will hold an outgoing fragment still and only a new incoming fragment will be animated.

universum.studios.android.fragment - package universum.studios.android.fragment
Provides base and common Fragment implementations that may be used in an Android application as base classes for a specific fragment implementations.

Provides group of annotations used across the Fragments library for simplified configuration.

Provides classes that may be used to simplify management of Fragments in an Android application, mainly theirs showing/changing/hiding.
